name: Crystal n.1
description:
Crystal in Soviet everyday life was an indicator of status and was an interior decoration. It was carefully kept behind glass and displayed wealth.
In my childhood I also had a wardrobe with crystal vases and dishes, they seemed to me precious and very beautiful. Now he has become just an echo of the past.

The project was presented at the "Open Studios" Winzavod CCA, Moscow (2020)


2550*3510/jpg 
scanography, 2015-2020
